name: LoGS
description:
A logic gate simulator which can be used to design circuits involving the following gates :
AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR.

Controls - 

Click on the gate and place it on the screen.

Inputs for a gate can be changed by clicking on a gate.

Wires can be connected by hovering over a pin.

Add gates independent of other gates to Execution by hovering over a gate and press the E key, then click the Run button.

Move the camera using arrow keys.
